Package org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher.impl

A java package with different implementations of MonitorPointSender.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BufferedListenerPublisher.PublisherEventsListener
    The interface to be notified about events happening in the BufferedPublisherBase.
    ListenerPublisher.PublisherEventsListener
    The interface to be notified about events happening in the BufferedPublisherBase.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferedFilePublisherBase
    Base class for the publishers that write strings (with different format) on a file.
    BufferedListenerPublisher
    ListenerPublisher is an implementation of MonitorPointSender for testing the BufferedPublisherBase: monitor points are sent to the listener.
    FilePublisher
    A publisher that dumps messages in the passed writer.
    JsonFilePublisher
    A publisher that dumps JSON messages in the passed writer.
    KafkaPublisher
    The publisher of monitor point values through Kafka.
    ListenerPublisher
    ListenerPublisher is an implementation of MonitorPointSender for testing the BufferedPublisherBase: monitor points are sent to the listener.

Package org.eso.ias.plugin.publisher.impl Description

A java package with different implementations of MonitorPointSender.

The actual implementation to use is defined by dependency injection. The plugin comes with different implementations to be able to use different transport system without changing the code. Some of the implementations will be useful for debugging and testing.

Author:
acaproni
